tasks.task_description: Fix AndroidManifest.xml - remove invalid launchMode from application tag
Check and fix MainActivity.kt for common issues
Check and fix LoginActivity.kt for common issues

description: Fix all issues in Brave Brain Android app
context: Fixed AndroidManifest.xml by removing invalid launchMode attribute from application tag and removing invalid permissions (SYSTEM_OVERLAY_WINDOW, INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDOW, FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES)
Fixed LoginActivity by replacing deprecated startActivityForResult/onActivityResult with modern Activity Result API (registerForActivityResult)

Completed analysis. Fixed 3 critical issues: 1) Invalid launchMode on application tag in AndroidManifest, 2) Invalid permissions in AndroidManifest, 3) Deprecated API in LoginActivity. Build configuration and Firebase setup are valid. Created ISSUES_FIXED.md documenting all findings.
